title: Operations Manager – Short-Term Rental Property Management Remote | Full-Time | $20/hour | High-Responsibility Role
job_overview:
Are you highly intelligent, obsessively hardworking, and capable of running operations at an elite level? Do you thrive in fast-paced, high-accountability environments and want to grow into an executive role?

Luxury Lodging is a fast-scaling short-term rental property management company with homes across the U.S. We are hiring a top 1% offshore Operations Manager to help us build systems, solve operational problems, manage vendors, and improve internal performance across the board.

This is a high-performance role—only apply if you're ready to bring extreme work ethic, speed, and problem-solving ability every day.


What You’ll Be Responsible For:

Contractor & Vendor Oversight
    •    Research and track the 20+ most common short-term rental issues (e.g., plumbing, WiFi, AC)
    •    Gather contractor pricing across cities and monitor for overcharges or delays
    •    Help build and maintain a nationwide contractor network

Listing Optimization
    •    Optimize Airbnb/STR listings for higher revenue (title, description, photos, pricing)
    •    Create internal checklists and track listing performance improvements
    •    Research and test tools to improve revenue across platforms

Guest Review Removal & Policy Enforcement
    •    Research Airbnb review removal rules, guest violation policies, and enforcement tactics
    •    Help develop a system to detect and dispute unfair or policy-violating reviews
    •    Collect documentation from guests that supports violations

General Operations
    •    Identify broken systems and build better ones
    •    Help manage offshore team productivity and accountability
    •    Track and report operational KPIs and guest experience metrics


Schedule & Time Commitment:
    •    Core Hours: 9:00 AM – 7:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday
    •    Expected Hours: Minimum 50+ hours per week
    •    Availability: Must be reachable via phone/text on weekends in case of urgent issues (minimal, but required)


Ideal Candidate:
    •    Extremely intelligent, fast learner, and deeply analytical
    •    Works fast—slow workers or overthinkers will not thrive here
    •    Strong communication, documentation, and research ability
    •    Obsessed with improving systems and solving problems without being asked
    •    Experience in operations, project management, STR, or vendor management is a big plus


Compensation:
    •    $20/hour USD (Full-Time, Tracked Hours via Software)
    •    10% raise structure every 3 months for top performers
    •    Long-term role with potential to grow into a high-level executive position
